snippet: Citing cost,  Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey rejected the bill to set up voting at as many as seven locations in each county during a 14-day period before elections.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie vetoes bill to set up voting at up to seven locations in each county during a 14-day period before elections; says bill would have cost an estimated $25 million in the first year.
lead_paragraph: Citing cost,  Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey rejected the bill to set up voting at as many as seven locations in each county during a 14-day period before elections.
